name: smash-it
description: Web game where you have to smash falling brussels.

scripts.build:styles: npm run styles && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:scripts: npm run lint && npm run scripts
scripts.build:scripts:prod: npm run lint && npm run scripts:prod
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts && npm run imagemin && npm run html
scripts.build:prod: npm run clear && npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts:prod && npm run imagemin && npm run html:prod
scripts.serve: ./node_modules/parallelshell/index.js 'npm run server' 'npm run watch:scripts' 'npm run styles'
scripts.server: npm run build && ./node_modules/browser-sync/bin/browser-sync.js start --server dist --files 'dist/styles/*.css, dist/scripts/*.js'
scripts.server:prod: npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/browser-sync/bin/browser-sync.js start --server dist --files 'dist/styles/*.css, dist/js/*.js'
scripts.scripts: cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js src/scripts/vendor && ./node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o build.js optimize=none && rm src/scripts/vendor/require.js
scripts.scripts:prod: cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js src/scripts/vendor && ./node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o build.js && rm src/scripts/vendor/require.js
